<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.TilePane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.typejam.SelectModeController"> <children> <StackPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="495.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 0; -fx-arc-width: 0;" width="760.0" /> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="419.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-width: 70; -fx-arc-height: 70;" width="678.0" /> </children> </StackPane> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" layoutX="37.0" layoutY="112.0" prefHeight="347.0" prefWidth="684.0"> <children> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="SELECT MODE"> <VBox.margin> <Insets /> </VBox.margin> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="32.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fx:id="errorText" fill="RED" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Select a mode first!" visible="false"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="14.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="5.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Text> <StackPane prefHeight="108.0" prefWidth="684.0"> <children> <Button fx:id="timeChallengeBtn" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onTimeChallengeClick" prefHeight="78.0" prefWidth="403.0" style="-fx-background-color: #f0f0f0; -fx-border-color: #cccccc; -fx-border-width: 2; -fx-background-radius: 10; -fx-border-radius: 10;" /> <VBox alignment="CENTER" mouseTransparent="true" prefHeight="107.0" prefWidth="684.0"> <children> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Time Challenge" wrappingWidth="368.1367392539978"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="18.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Race against the clock" wrappingWidth="363.4700826704502"> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="3.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Text> </children> </VBox> </children> </StackPane> <StackPane prefHeight="89.0" prefWidth="684.0"> <children> <Button fx:id="endlessModeBtn" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onEndlessModeClick" prefHeight="78.0" prefWidth="403.0" style="-fx-background-color: #f0f0f0; -fx-border-color: #cccccc; -fx-border-width: 2; -fx-background-radius: 10; -fx-border-radius: 10;" /> <VBox alignment="CENTER" mouseTransparent="true" prefHeight="107.0" prefWidth="684.0"> <children> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Endless Mode" wrappingWidth="368.1367392539978"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="18.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Type until you finish all text" wrappingWidth="363.4700826704502"> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="3.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Text> </children> </VBox> </children> </StackPane> <Button fx:id="next_btn" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onNext" prefHeight="56.0" prefWidth="199.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 50;" text="NEXT" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="25.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="20.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Button> <!-- Add your mode selection buttons here --> </children> </VBox> <TilePane alignment="CENTER" hgap="10.0" layoutX="43.0" layoutY="37.0" mouseTransparent="true" prefHeight="78.0" prefWidth="678.0"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="11.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 30; -fx-arc-width: 10;" width="140.0" /> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="11.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 30; -fx-arc-width: 10;" width="140.0" /> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#d9d9d9" height="11.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 30; -fx-arc-width: 10;" width="140.0" /> </children> </TilePane> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" layoutX="44.0" layoutY="38.0" prefHeight="70.0" prefWidth="94.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 100;"> <children> <Button fx:id="back_btn" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onBack" prefHeight="52.0" prefWidth="52.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 100; -fx-border-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="52.0" fitWidth="52.0" mouseTransparent="true" pickOnBounds="false" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/back.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> <HBox.margin> <Insets left="15.0" top="10.0" /> </HBox.margin> </Button> </children> </HBox> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<StackPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1"> <children> <!-- Semi-transparent dark background --> <Rectangle fill="BLACK" height="495.0" width="760.0" opacity="0.5" />
<!-- Overlay text --> <Text fill="WHITE" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="OVERLAY" textAlignment="CENTER"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="48.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </StackPane>
